Package tage.networking.server

Interface IServerSocket

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TCPServerSocket, UDPServerSocket
    public interface IServerSocket
    Defines a server side socket.
    Author:
    Kyle Matz Modified from the SAGE Networking package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz. Ported to TAGE by Scott Gordon.

                int port,
                java.io.Serializable object)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a Serializable object to the specified address and port.

      • createClientInfo

        IClientInfo createClientInfo​(java.net.InetAddress clientAddr,
                             int clientPort)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a IClientInfo with the appropriate information for a client.
        Parameters:
        clientAddr - client's address
        clientPort - client's port
        Returns:
        a client information data structure for the client information
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
       throws java.io.IOException
        Shuts down this server socket. Responsible for cleaning up any necessary objects used by this socket.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
